projectContent.heading: Summary
projectContent.content: Ryyd is a React Web Application which am building in oder to provide community a platform where users can offer carpooling rides and users can also search for rides options for inter-city commute.

projectContent.heading: Challenges
projectContent.content: 1) To build api to handle login, Register, logout, forget password services. </br> 2) To build API to handle operations like login, Register, Publish Rides, search rides. </br> 3) To build interactive UI for easy engagement of users with application. </br> 4) Users can search for rides based on destination, date and time.

projectContent.heading: Road Map
projectContent.content: Workflow Diagram </br> Created a workflow diagram in order to keep track of application flow and also helps to connect different part of UI components.

projectContent.heading: UI Mockups
projectContent.content: I used Figma as interface design tool to build mockups for ryyd application and below are some mockups i made for my project.

projectContent.heading: Summary
projectContent.content: The veganhood is a blog based on veganism and i build this project as freelance. I used Angular framework as frontend and node as backend

projectContent.heading: Challenges
projectContent.content: 1) To build a website with interactive UI using Angular frame work. </br> 2) To make dynamic list of blog pages and render content from json. </br> 3) To build a comment component and save comments data in mongoDB. </br> 4) To make UI responsive across all devices.

projectContent.heading: Summary
projectContent.content: The Explorers getaway is a travel agency website based and i build this project as freelance. I used Angular framework.

projectContent.heading: Challenges
projectContent.content: 1) To build a website with interactive UI using Angular frame work. </br>  2) To use json data to populate travel itinerary for different locations.
